Package com.RISE.sylla.controller

Class userController

java.lang.Object
com.RISE.sylla.controller.userController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/users") public class userController extends Object
This Class redirects '/user' to the appropriate methods defined in the userService

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=POST) public userModel createUser(@RequestBody userModel user)
      POST method '/users' creating user with params body need to look like : { "firstname": "test", "lastname": "test", "email": "test", "role": "test", "matricule" : 12345, "trigram" : "test" }
      Parameters:
      user - param user object
      Returns:
      new posted user

    • readUsers

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=GET) public List<userModel> readUsers()
      GET method '/users' returning users
      Returns:
      list of all users

    • readUserById

      @RequestMapping(value="/{userId}", method=GET) public Optional<userModel> readUserById(@PathVariable("userId") Long id)
      GET method '/users/{userId}' returning user corresponding to id as param
      Parameters:
      id - of the user to be returned
      Returns:
      If it exists, the user

    • updateUsers

      @RequestMapping(value="/{userId}", method=PUT) public userModel updateUsers(@PathVariable("userId") Long id, @RequestBody userModel userDetails)
      PUT method '/users/{userId}' updating the user with the specified id body need to look like : { "userId": 1, "firstName": "test", "lastName": "test", "emailId":"test", "role": "test", "matricule" : 1, "trigram" : "test" }
      Parameters:
      id - of the user to modify
      userDetails - details to modify with variables
      Returns:
      the user modified

    • deleteUser

      @RequestMapping(value="/{userId}", method=DELETE) public void deleteUser(@PathVariable("userId") Long id)
      DELETE method '/users/{userId}' with specified id of the user
      Parameters:
      id - of the user to delete
